Doc: A type defining the fee payable on exercise of an option. This fee may be defined as an amount or a percentage of the notional exercised.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type defining the fee payable on exercise of an option. This fee may be defined as an amount or a percentage of the notional exercised.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.ExerciseFee {
  # A reference to the party responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
  payerPartyReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.PartyReference

  # A reference to the account responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
  payerAccountReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.AccountReference?

  # A reference to the party that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
  receiverPartyReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.PartyReference?

  # A reference to the account that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
  receiverAccountReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.AccountReference?

  # A pointer style reference to the associated notional schedule defined elsewhere in the document.
  notionalReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.NotionalReference?

  # The amount of fee to be paid on exercise. The fee currency is that of the referenced notional.
  feeAmount : decimal

  # A fee represented as a percentage of some referenced notional. A percentage of 5% would be represented as 0.05.
  feeRate : decimal

  # The date on which exercise fee(s) will be paid. It is specified as a relative date.
  feePaymentDate : FpML5.recordkeeping.RelativeDateOffset?

}

payerPartyReference.Doc: A reference to the party responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
payerPartyReference.Name: payerPartyReference

payerAccountReference.Doc: A reference to the account responsible for making the payments defined by this structure.
payerAccountReference.Name: payerAccountReference

receiverPartyReference.Doc: A reference to the party that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
receiverPartyReference.Name: receiverPartyReference

receiverAccountReference.Doc: A reference to the account that receives the payments corresponding to this structure.
receiverAccountReference.Name: receiverAccountReference

notionalReference.Doc: A pointer style reference to the associated notional schedule defined elsewhere in the document.
notionalReference.Name: notionalReference

feeAmount.Doc: The amount of fee to be paid on exercise. The fee currency is that of the referenced notional.
feeAmount.Name: feeAmount

feeRate.Doc: A fee represented as a percentage of some referenced notional. A percentage of 5% would be represented as 0.05.
feeRate.Name: feeRate

feePaymentDate.Doc: The date on which exercise fee(s) will be paid. It is specified as a relative date.
feePaymentDate.Name: feePaymentDate
